name: RetroThreeKingdoms-special edition
description:
• You can proceed with a large-scale siege with accurate collision determination between players. (1000 to 1000)
  • Supports 19 languages (English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Spanish, Khmer, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Turkish, Polish, Portuguese, Thai, Russian, Mongolian, Latam, Brazilian, Vietnamese)
  • 24 unique characters are waiting for you.
  • Make a brother in the game. When you are in an emergency, he runs to your side.
  • Various events are held depending on the weather and wind direction.

  • Register the license key you received when purchasing in-game. Then all functions will be activated.
  •  You can only create one account per license key.

  • You need to download all 3 files.

  • Then you can unzip the file.

  • Access the game and register the license key.

  • Only one account with a registered license key will function normally.
